thread.title: Bright: Will Smith's Netflix movie gets new teaser
thread.title_full: Bright: Will Smith's Netflix movie gets new teaser

author: Chancellor Agard
title: Bright: Will Smith's Netflix movie gets new teaser
text:
Netflix 
Our first look at Will Smith’s next movie is finally here. 
Netflix released the first teaser trailer for Bright during the Oscars telecast on Sunday. Directed by David Ayer, the fantasy thriller stars Smith as a LAPD cop teaming up with an orc, played by Joel Edgerton, to protect a magical wand. 
Clocking in at 30 seconds, the new teaser doesn’t give away too much else about the plot. It begins with Smith driving around the city, which might be on the verge of chaos given the high police presence in the street, as “This Land Is Your Land” plays. But, then the song cuts out and we’re shown a flurry of images featuring fantastical creatures and Smith wielding a rusty sword. 
“I’m assuming this doesn’t end well,” says Smith at the end of the clip. 
Watch the clip below. Bright is due in December. Fantasy has become reality. Will Smith and Joel Edgerton star in Bright, only on @netflix . pic.twitter.com/FJueEhMFCO 
— Bright Film (@BrightNetflix) February 27, 2017
